Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4)
fire damage.
The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving
throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity
saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.
